locations.title: Serengeti National Park
locations.description: Historic grounds where Uganda's independence was celebrated. Now hosts major events and recreational activities in the heart of Kampala.

locations.title: Pyramids, Egypt
locations.description: Ancient wonders of the world, with rich history and culture.

locations.title: Zanzibar, Tanzania
locations.description: A tropical paradise with beautiful beaches and rich history

locations.title: Maasai Mara, Kenya
locations.description: Famous for wildlife safaris, including the Great Migration

locations.title: Bazaruto Archipelago
locations.description: A pristine collection of islands perfect for snorkeling and diving.

locations.title: Victoria Falls
locations.description: One of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world.

locations.title: Cape Town
locations.description: Known for Table Mountain, beautiful beaches, and vibrant culture.

locations.title: Kyoto, Japan
locations.description: A city rich in history, with numerous temples, traditional tea houses, and beautiful cherry blossoms.

locations.title: Venice, Italy
locations.description: A city of canals, historic architecture, and rich cultural heritage. Best explored on foot or by gondola.
